Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
Very posh for the price of the stay. Extremely friendly staff. Great welcome that makes you feel like semi royalty. 
Pool is fabulous with great views. Lovely background music. Infused water on tap.
Complimentary raspberry ice lollies at the pool - a great surprise 
Towels and water at the gym ready for you on all the machines. That’s service before you even knew you needed service. 
Easy to get to the canal to have a late night stroll. Good food. 
Overall, highly recommended.
Negative_reviews:
Minor issues- 
After dinner ice cream scoop at the pool had a bit of ice in it- like It had refrozen. 
Lift key card to get to your floor does not work. You can go to any floor without using the key card
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Thanks
Negative_reviews: Thanks
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Perfect location, perfect price-quality , nice staff, spacious rooms, even did a cake suprise in my room for my birthday with a sweet card, will be back again!
Title: Exceptional

Negative_reviews: the air condition was so extreme directly coming over you like a wind. we got sick in the holiday. also the breakfast area is freezing. it has taken one week to recover.
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: Great view of burj, very large comfortable rooms.
Negative_reviews: Locatio  seemed mildly isolated
Title: Relaxing

Positive_reviews: Good location
Negative_reviews:
View from the window was on a wall of the same hotel. So... no view
Ordered room service and got sick of the food. Staff were very friendly and credited the meal, but bad food should not happen in such a hotel.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Clean, close to Dubai mall and amazing staffs
Negative_reviews: Nothing to talk about, it was amazing
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Everything was great from the service from the staff to the rooms. Only breakfast could be better
Negative_reviews: Breakfast could be served better.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
The hotel is great. Great location, facilities, spacious comfortable clean and quite rooms.
The staff is amazing: from door men, checkin, business lounge ladies..  all perfect!
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: It’s a nice hotel with good services
Negative_reviews: Some of the staff are not trained well enough with proper procedures and say very unkind things as a result.
Title: Almost great

Positive_reviews: everything's
Negative_reviews: lacking of taxis
Title: nice

Positive_reviews: It’s in a quiet area.
Negative_reviews: One receptionist that wasn’t very respectful.

Positive_reviews: Everything
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: every thing excellent
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Breakfast and business lounge
Negative_reviews: Very friendly staff
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Great place to stay.
Title: Highly recommended stay. Great for families. The continental breakfast was nice.

Positive_reviews: Location .. breakfast
Negative_reviews: Sofa set not comfortable.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews:
Very new modern hotel with beautiful design as you don't expect from the business hotel.
Very nice people at reception, we've got the personal tour of facilities and all details. Great job from Adnan.
Exellent job by manager of reservations - we've got upgrade to the junior suite. Very spacy and modern, unfortunately, without any nice view, which was not a problem for us as business travelers.
Good experience with business lounge- very good drinks and good snacks, nice service.
Very good organised airport and Abu Dhabi transfer, great concierge team. Every one is trying to do the best! Thanks a lot!
Negative_reviews:
The pool area is very nice in the evening, but not as comfy or spacy during the day. Very little pool,it's not possible to swimm, just to stay in the water. So no chance to get fitter by swimming during this stay. The sun chair are new and comfy, just not enough for all the guests. If you plan to stay 1 h at the pool- it's possible, just don't plan longer than that.
The most unpleasent experience we had with simple routine as the breakfest. We came on Sunday by mistake short before closing of buffet ( as they have different time over weekend and different weekend - Friday & Saturday). So the lady at the door did'nt let us in - even still 10 min left. After we said that we're going to the busness lounge instead- she changed her mind and let us in. The food look good, little bit untideness by presentation. But the worse were so many people and not enough service staff. So you have to ask 3 times for capuccino and "fight" that someone take care of your omlette.
The breakfets was very stressy and next time we will just not book this option.
Title: beautiful panoramic bar with view of Burj Khalifa, great staff, reasonable for Dubai prices

Positive_reviews: The staff are very friendly and helpful.
Title: Nice comfortable stay

Positive_reviews: Rooms are big and comfy. Design is smart and beautiful. Location is hard to beat, minutes from Dubai Mall. I really enjoyed my stay there. Hope they keep up the good work and standards going forward!
Negative_reviews: Nothing. It's perfect.
Title: Fantastic choice near downtown

Positive_reviews: We are so happy we got to celebrate our wedding anniversary at this amazing hotel! They went an extra mile for us and made our special day even more special.
Title: Amazing!

Positive_reviews:
All staff are amazing and very very helpful & respectful,  I was there last week for honeymoon and the management surprise 🎁 us with a delicious 😋 cake , every thing was amazing .and I will come back again for sure . 
Its very very clean , calm and the service is 10/10 . 
Thanks alot dear Radisson managment
Negative_reviews: I liked everything,  and strongly advice to book in this hotel.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: The facilities were great. Staff went above and beyond. Great bed.
Negative_reviews: Would have been good to have phone instructions on how to get a message. Rather not have had the fragrance when you enter the room.
Title: Much nicer hotel than I expected.

Positive_reviews:
Mr Talib at the front desk was a amazing guy, very friendly and cooperative,, that's how the guests should be handled. Good job. 
We were enjoyed our stay very much , a special thanks to Mr Talib. Cheers.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
A great hotel overall. New, clean, efficient, great views from terrace and our room. We were upgraded to a suite after our initial room was not what we had booked.
The business room access was WELL worth the extra and most evenings we had this to ourselves whilst waited upon happily by Lorie May - a MOST EXCELLENT member of staff who got it just right. The balance between efficient service, politeness and friendliness. Nothing was too much trouble but she did not over complicate matters or intrude on our personal space.
This was the problem elsewhere when staff did over complicate things, of where systems did this automatically. For example did to changes with flights we required an extra night, this was booked ahead of our visit and I contacted the hotel to explain and try to pre-empt any problems with potentially having to move rooms. At check in they confirmed we would keep the same room no problem. However, we were not told we would need to check out, pay, check in again and even change room key cards which we only discovered on our return to the room which we could no longer access. A minor thing but easily avoided. Not five star when it involves hasstle for the  great hotel overall. New, clean, efficient, great views from terrace and our room. We were upgraded to a suite after our initial room was not what we had booked.
The business room access was WELL worth the extra and most evenings we had this to ourselves whilst waited upon happily by Lorie May - a MOST EXCELLENT member of staff who got it just right. The balance between efficient service, politeness and friendliness. Nothing was too much trouble but she did not over complicate matters or intrude on our personal space.
This was the problem elsewhere when staff did over complicate things, of where systems did this automatically.
Negative_reviews: See above
Title: 40th birthday treat

Negative_reviews: Foods isn’t good enough
Title: Good

Negative_reviews: Bathroom in room 1614
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Reasonable price, nice atmosphere and convenient facilities
Negative_reviews: AC was hitting on the middle of the room, it should fix to distribute air around the room
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews:
Very neat, clean hotel. 
In a very good, serene and easily accessible location, with super-marts, some cafes and restaurants within walking distances.
Overseeing the bay, loved the view from my room. You can walk or cycle by the bay line.
Amenities were also in top shape, probably considering the hotel is still few months old?
Loved the the friendliness of the ENTIRE staff (not a single one to be faulted - from restaurants’ waitresses and waiters, to concierges, to receptionists, housekeeping and especially the porters). All very well mannered and courteous, Just what you should get from every standard hotel, star rating isn’t a consequence.
As there were available rooms, I was also given an early check-in (@7am) without so much as a hassle on the time I arrived. Thanks Radisson for that, I was buzzed out from a really long trip.
Someone mentioned prostitution and all when I was reading reviews, this is very untrue! Even my wife and kids had to be registered when they came to visit me, before they were allowed into my room. Hotel doesn’t allow unregistered guests, Class! Visited the club close to the hotel and got back to my room late, feeling very secured.
Negative_reviews:
The breakfast and A la carte could be better. 
Stayed in the business class room and expected the food in the business lounge to be tastier than it was - for the value paid.
It was worse off in the regular breakfast area.
Had to eat out most days - I like to eat only when I’ll enjoy the meal.
This area requires some improvements.
Title:
Nice Hotel and Thumbs-up to the staffs!
Will Definitely stay again and Again!

Negative_reviews: Location and price
Title: Good value of money

Positive_reviews: Fantastic location
Title: Very good

Positive_reviews: The room was beautiful, the bed outstanding. Best bed we slept in for 6 weeks. Staff always so friendly. Breakfasts were amazing and good value for money.
Negative_reviews: Bit to far from metro only downfall if u can call it that.
Title: A definite place to stay

Positive_reviews: Everything was going well.. U made my birthday vacation perfect as planned
Negative_reviews: Nothing
Title: Perfect

Positive_reviews: Fantastic hotel from all sides, staff and service are the best. The rooms are spacious and the furniture is lovely. The location of the hotel is excellent and close to the Dubai Mall. I hope Nespresso coffee machine is available in the rooms.
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews:
Staff were very friendly and helped us out a lot.
Excellent facilities.
Negative_reviews: Nothing - everything was perfect
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Great bed and breakfast
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: The facilities and the readiness and kindness of all. Great decor, excellent layout of rooms.
Negative_reviews: This was a second stay. One of the staff members got very ‘in your face’ when he saw my passport.
Title: Some peace and quite but close to everything

Positive_reviews: It’s new, so everything is alright
Negative_reviews: Some staff
Title: Excellent

Positive_reviews: Every thing was grateful
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Everything. Staff were amazing, couldn’t do enough for us. Particularly good, and this is by no means exhaustive, were Ferdi on the front door, Sunil, Vispin and Diana by the pool, John Paul in Makar Scottish Bar, and Jeffrey, Marvin and Antony in Fire Lake. Good happy hour offers in the bars, great atmosphere in Fire Lake, Makar a little quiet possibly due to its somewhat hidden location on floor P1. Pool was perfect for spending a morning relaxing and unwinding. The view of Burj Khalifa from Fire Lake is something else, particularly in the evening. Room was spotless and modern, great value for money. Location was great, short taxi ride from Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall. It’s walking distance but DON’T try it. The heat is unbearable and you’ll lose 5 pounds in sweat by the time you get there! Metro nearby too but taxis easier and often just as cheap.
Negative_reviews:
That we couldn’t stay longer.
An alarm went off randomly at about 1am one night. Being asked where we want to sit in Republic bar, then as we made our way in being told we couldn’t go in because I was wearing shorts. Very minor points in an otherwise perfect stay.
Title: Best hotel in great location. Amazing staff!!!

Room, breakfast,location is excellent 
Talib is very friendly and helpful and also all staff is very friendly
I checked-in 12o’clock and checked out 6 O’clock without extra charge

We complained and they moved us to a better room. The lebanese club downstairs is filled with prostitutes and the music is so load
Title: Disappointing

Negative_reviews:
In room dining has a serious issue , always late to get your order and guess what this time my order took an hour and 15 min . ( at the end they gave it comp. thanks ) but it’s not about money , it was just a salad and a glass of wine !!!
By the way , I stayed in the past 2 months twice and same happened , so this time I had to write you this . 
Also the operators take ages to Answer the calls after mid night . 
Thanks

Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Service was generally friendly and good, there was a view of a side perspective of the Burj Kalifa
Negative_reviews: The rooms is very, very small, decoration is very basic in quality and taste and some facilities like a kettle or a desk lamp were not working. Decor of the hotel is very simplistic. Room was not cleaned daily-merely towels were changed on some days. Location is not bad, but one has to take taxi virtually everywhere.

Negative_reviews: The staff was rude , there weren’t flexible with check in and check out, the price was much more than the price during my booking, they weren’t welcoming, I will never book at this hotel again.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: The staff, concierge and dining, especially breakfast were just wonderful.
Negative_reviews: Housekeeping had few issues. Asked for a bucket of ice. After using it the bucket was left in the room for 2 days. Onone occasion we had to call for toilet rool.to be supplied.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: The locatoin and the view.

Staff entered our room without ringing the bell or knock on the door.
The are slow to bring if you ask for something bur fast when you have to leave.
